name: E20R Payment Warnings for Paid Memberships Pro
author: Thomas Sjolshagen @ Eighty / 20 Results by Wicked Strong Chicks, LLC <thomas@eighty20results.com>

sections.description: A more reliable and up-to-date notification system than the standard Recurring Payment Email Reminder add-on for Paid Memberships Pro. The E20R Payment Warning for PMPro plugin will utilize the most recent information generated by the payment gateway itself, rather than rely on disconnected data on your local WordPress site. Paid Memberships Pro does NOT store the payment data locally on your web server
sections.changelog:
1.1

  1. ENHANCEMENT: Add ability to process large number of users across multiple requests
  2. ENHANCEMENT: Process at most 250 user data records at a time
  3. ENHANCEMENT: Add filter to let admin set # of requests to process per dispatch (TODO: Make this a global setting)
  4. ENHANCEMENT: Only trigger processing for subscriptions (payment warning data) if enabled
  5. ENHANCEMENT: Use passed background processing handler class from received data in task() method
  6. ENHANCEMENT: Removed unneeded debug logging from Background Processing class
  7. ENHANCEMENT: Disable debug/test actions
  8. BUG FIX: Would display incorrect debug message when plugin was licensed
  9. BUG FIX: Attempted to save and dispatch background job during data loop in task() method
  10. BUG FIX: Didn't dispatch large request handler properly (Now class is instantiated during/before `plugins_loaded` action hook to ensure proper execution)
  11. BUG FIX: Attempted to save and dispatch large request handler data during loop
  12. BUG FIX: Only process subscription data in get_remote_subscription_data() method
  13. BUG FIX: Only process payment data in get_remote_payment_data() method
  14. BUG FIX: Didn't include the amount_from_currency() method for Stripe specific amount formatting

1.0

  1. Initial Release (v1.0)
